definition: to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid

sentences.english: Now, if they had but known it, they had been wronging Tilbury all the time.
sentences.chinese: 他們並不知道自己完全錯怪了提爾伯裏。

sentences.english: Dido, with a numerous body of friends and followers, both men and women, succeeded in effecting their escape from Tyre.
sentences.chinese: 狄多成功地帶着一大批男女朋友和侍從逃出了提爾。

sentences.english: They are like black holes burnt by torches in a tapestry of Tyre.
sentences.chinese: 它們就像提爾掛毯上燒出來的黑洞。

sentences.english: The company currently has two main software packages.
sentences.chinese: 帕蘭提爾技術公司目前擁有兩套主要的軟件套件。

sentences.english: She teaches writing at College of DuPage and Benedictine University.
sentences.chinese: 佛提爾目前在杜佩奇學院及本篤會大學教寫作。

sentences.english: He quelled a rebellion in Egypt and successfully besieged Tyre.
sentences.chinese: 他平定了埃及的叛亂，成功的征服了提爾。

sentences.english: Mr. Stiles is so arrogant that he refuses to accept any suggestions at all.
sentences.chinese: 史提爾先生很自大，他拒絕接受任何建議。

sentences.english: "If you are including tilbury" said he "it don't apply.
sentences.chinese: “這話要是包括提爾伯裏，”他說，“他可擔當不起。
